src:
Story behind the photo: Achche din?
05 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
Neither tea nor coffee, only ice cream satisfies this teacup vendor’s craving The picture was clicked by reader Jameel Aahmed MilansaarIf you have a picture and a story to share, send us the picture with your name and number at mybangaloremirror@timesgroup.com
